title: Hamas hostage videos are cruel, manipulative, revealing. Experts expect more.
description: Hamas’s latest hostage video was met with a mix of revulsion and relief. Experts say it’s part of a strategy to increase pressure on the Israeli government.

title: Egypt’s hospitals are ready to treat injured Gazans, but the border is closed
description: Gaza’s hospital system is collapsing in the face of continuous Israeli bombardment. Across the border in Egypt, hundreds of beds for wounded Palestinians lie empty.

title: King Charles in Kenya says ‘no excuses’ but gives no apology for colonial violence
description: Speaking at a state banquet on Tuesday, Charles hewed closely to the British government line, saying he felt “the greatest sorrow and the deepest regret.”

title: FBI director: U.S. must be vigilant on threats amid Israel-Gaza war
description: Many types of extremists, from the far left to the far right, exhibit strains of antisemitism, FBI Director Christopher A. Wray told lawmakers.

title: Jack Lew poised to be confirmed as U.S. ambassador to Israel
description: One month after Lew’s nomination, Hamas launched a surprise attack on Israel, and Israel subsequently declared war. Lew’s nomination has been on a fast track since then.

title: Strikes on Jabalya refugee camp kill and injure scores in Gaza
description: The rising civilian toll in Gaza brings more questions about how to mobilize aid amid Israel’s expanding air and ground offensive.

title: Israel’s missing: Forensic workers struggle to put names to the dead
description: Of the more than 1,400 people killed by Hamas on Oct. 7, there are some 200 badly damaged bodies that reman unnamed. Israel has turned to archeologists for help.

title: Is the U.S. getting involved as Israel fights Hamas in Gaza? What to know.
description: President Biden has unveiled a $14.3 billion aid package for Israel, focused on air and missile defense support as well as other forms of military assistance.

title: Gunman seizes hostages in rare standoff at Tokyo area post office
description: Shots were fired at a hospital and two people wounded before the suspect fled on a motorcycle. The man has since been holed up in a post office for hours.

title: From forest to penthouse: What it takes to build a high-rise out of wood
description: Architects are experimenting with a greener way to build.

title: What is Islamic Jihad, the group Israel blames for Gaza hospital strike?
description: The United States has labeled the Sunni Muslim militant group a foreign terrorist organization. It is smaller than Hamas but shares a goal of destroying Israel.

title: Blinken, Austin to press for Israel, Ukraine aid in Senate testimony
description: The Biden administration is seeking billions of dollars in supplemental funding to help Israel and Ukraine.

title: What is Hamas, and why did it attack Israel now?
description: The intensifying war between Israel and Palestinian militant group Hamas explained.

title: As Israel pummels Gaza, the crisis in the West Bank comes into focus
description: An already deteriorating situation in the West Bank is drifting in an alarming direction.

title: Israel-Gaza war live updates: Israel pushes farther into Gaza, rejects cease-fire
description: Israel is continuing its advance into Gaza with tanks and soldiers, along with its relentless bombing campaign.
